id: The Best Notion Template For Inventory Management
name: The Best Notion Template For Inventory Management
description: The power of Notion is now available to everyone to manage their store's inventory seamlessly.Key highlights Easy to get started even if you have never used Notion before. Notion users will find it very familiar. A detailed video tutorial on how to use the template. Manage all your products and their variations Manage all your suppliers, PO orders, and overall sourcing Manage all your warehouses and stock entries Manage all your sales orders Manage customers list Manage account payables and rece
features: Easy to get started even if you have never used Notion before. Notion users will find it very familiar.; A detailed video tutorial on how to use the template.; Manage all your products and their variations; Manage all your suppliers, PO orders, and overall sourcing; Manage all your warehouses and stock entries; Manage all your sales orders; Manage customers list; Manage account payables and receivables; Easily customize all aspects of the database to suit your inventory management use cases. For example, adding a custom property to the Supplier database.
